meanings.definition: To damage the reputation of (someone) by false accusations; slander.
meanings.sent1: The jealous classmate was smirching Sarah's good name with lies.
meanings.sent2: The tabloids are constantly smirching celebrities for more readers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous parrot started smirching the cat's reputation around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The online trolls enjoy smirching innocent people behind the safety of their screens.
meanings.sent5: The politician's opponents tried smirching his character before the election.
